FuncDef:
The multicast-domain log switch-group-reuse command displays logs about Switch-Group address reuse.
The undo multicast-domain log command restores the default configuration.
By default, no log about the Switch-Group address reuse is displayed.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv4 address family view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the multicast VPN module is faulty, run the multicast-domain log switch-group-reuse command to view logs about the Switch-Group address reuse. The log information will help you with fault diagnosis.
Prerequisites
The multicast-domain share-group command has been configured in the VPN.
